Metro Conference: 1985, 1986, 1987, 1989, 1990, 1991 |conference_season = Atlantic Coast Conference: 1968 }} The '''[[South Carolina Gamecocks]] men's [[tennis]] team''' represents the [[University of South Carolina]] and competes in the [[Southeastern Conference]]. The team has been coached by [[Kent DeMars]] since 1985. ==Head coaches==
